mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (title,content, writer, cnt) values (#{title},#{content},#{writer},cnt.NEXTVAL)
mapper.select: SELECT title,content, writer, cnt, viewcnt FROM board WHERE cnt = #{cnt}
SELECT title,content,writer,cnt FROM board WHERE cnt = #{cnt}
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title = #{title}, content = #{content} WHERE cnt = #{cnt}
UPDATE board SET viewcnt = viewcnt + 1 where cnt = #{cnt}
